Tall and thin, with short brown hair.  Wears round glasses, has deep blue eyes.  Usually wears a dark blue robe with silver embroidery of old magic symbols.  His wand is walnut wood, with silver patterns and a sapphire on top.
Medium build, reddish-brown hair, faint facial features, and almost always wears collared clothing throughout the year
